titleStmt.title: Venning's remains, or, Christ's school consisting of four classes of Christians, I. babes, II. little children, III. young men, IV. fathers : with their several characteristical differences and attainments, also the doctrines proper to be taught to each of them : being the substance of many sermons / preached by Ralph Venning and fitted by him for the press before his death.
titleStmt.author: Venning, Ralph, 1621?-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Hancock senior and junior,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
